headline: Vertex to Participate in TD Cowen 46th Annual Health Care Conference on March 3
summary: BOSTON, February 17, 2026--Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) today announced management participation in TD Cowen’s 46th Annual Health Care Conference. Reshma Kewalramani, President and Chief Executive Officer will participate in a fireside chat on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, at 9:10 a.m. ET.

headline: Canaccord Genuity Maintains Hold on Vertex Pharmaceuticals, Raises Price Target to $441
summary: Canaccord Genuity  analyst Whitney Ijem   maintains Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) with a Hold and raises the price target from $411 to $441.
